mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (username, email, password, role, is_active, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{username}, #{email}, #{password}, #{role}, #{isActive}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, username, email, password, role, is_active, created_at, updated_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET username = #{username}, email = #{email}, password = #{password}, role = #{role}, is_active = #{isActive}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE username = #{username} LIMIT 1
